item.title: Leena add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "If you had to identify, in one word, the reason why the human race has not achieved, and never will achieve, its full potential, that word would be 'meetings." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Leena add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "You can only be young once. But you can always be immature." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Leena add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Leena add a quote by Marie Curie
item.description: "Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less." -- Marie Curie

item.title: Leena add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Half our life is spent trying to find something to do with the time we have rushed through life trying to save." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Leena add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Everything is funny as long as it is happening to somebody else." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Leena add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Leena add a quote by Georgia O'Keefe
item.description: "If you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for a moment." -- Georgia O'Keefe

item.title: Leena add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leena add a quote by Annie Dillard
item.description: "People who read are not too lazy to turn on the television; they prefer books." -- Annie Dillard

item.title: Leena add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "She is too fond of books, and it has turned her brain." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Leena add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Leena add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Leena add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quite alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be and that God wishes to see people happy, amidst the simple beauty of nature. As longs as this exists, and it certainly always will, I know that then there will always be comfort for every sorrow, whatever the circumstances may be. And I firmly believe that nature brings solace in all troubles." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Leena add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is no friend as loyal as a book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Leena add a quote by Agatha Christi
item.description: "I like living. I have sometimes been wildly, despairingly, acutely miserable, racked with sorrow; but through it all I still know quite certainly that just to be alive is a grand thing." -- Agatha Christi

item.title: Leena add a quote by Walter Kirn
item.description: "Art, art of any kind, shows that folks are trying." -- Walter Kirn

item.title: Leena add a quote by Kazuo Ishiguro
item.description: "There was another life that I might have had, but I am having this one." -- Kazuo Ishiguro
